str2: A primary particle; but, and, etc.
Of Hebrew origin; properly, firm, i.e. trustworthy; adverbially, surely.

parse: Verb - Present Indicative Active - 1st Person Singular
str2: (a) I say, speak; I mean, mention, tell, (b) I call, name, especially in the pass., (c) I tell, command.

parse: Personal / Possessive Pronoun - Dative 2nd Person Plural
str2: You. The person pronoun of the second person singular; thou.
Where, whither, in what place. From hos and pou; what(-ever) where, i.e. At whichever spot.
The, the definite article. Including the feminine he, and the neuter to in all their inflections; the definite article; the.
From the same as euaggelizo; a good message, i.e. The gospel.

parse: Verb - Aorist Subjunctive Passive - 3rd Person Singular
str2: To proclaim, herald, preach. Of uncertain affinity; to herald, especially divine truth.
A primary preposition; to or into, of place, time, or purpose; also in adverbial phrases.
All, the whole, entire, complete. A primary word; 'whole' or 'all', i.e. Complete, especially as noun or adverb.
The, the definite article. Including the feminine he, and the neuter to in all their inflections; the definite article; the.
Probably from the base of komizo; orderly arrangement, i.e. Decoration; by implication, the world (morally).

parse: Personal / Relative Pronoun - Accusative Neuter Singular
Personal / Possessive Pronoun - Nominative Feminine Singular
Verb - Aorist Indicative Active - 3rd Person Singular
str2: (a) I make, manufacture, construct, (b) I do, act, cause. Apparently a prolonged form of an obsolete primary; to make or do.

parse: Verb - Future Indicative Passive - 3rd Person Singular
str2: A prolonged form of an otherwise obsolete verb; to talk, i.e. Utter words.
A primary preposition; to or into, of place, time, or purpose; also in adverbial phrases.
Reminder, memorial; a remembrance offering. From mnemoneuo; a reminder, i.e. Record.

parse: Personal / Possessive Pronoun - Genitive Feminine 3rd Person Singular
str2: He, she, it, they, them, same. From the particle au; the reflexive pronoun self, used of the third person, and of the other persons.
